All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
DistanceTest
Integration tests for the distance calculation and secured endpoint authorization.
DistanceUtil
Calculates the distance in kilometers between two points on the Earth's surface given their latitude and longitude coordinates.
ExceptionUtil
 
IPostRepository
Repository interface for accessing and managing postcode geolocation data.
IService<E>
 
IUploadFileService
 
KeycloakConfig
Configuration class for integrating Keycloak with Spring Security.
KeyCloakResolver
Configuration class that tells Keycloak to use Spring Boot properties (application.yml or application.properties) instead of keycloak.json for configuration.
LoginTest
Integration test for verifying Keycloak authentication and authorization for protected Spring Boot endpoints.
PostRepositoryTest
Unit tests for IPostRepository using H2 in-memory database.
PostService
 
RepositotyTest
Integration tests for verifying Spring context loading and controller availability.
